comments.comment: put all these 225 members in the jail right away.  we will elect you for another 25years and 22.5 million people will stands for you to do any changes to the constitution which suites to Srilankans
comments.author: Randy Rupasinghe

replies.replyComment:
I agree with you Randy and a change in the constitution is essential to prevent corrupt. 
Anybody suspected of perpetrating  robbing of national resources should be sacked from their position immediately and should be not be permitted to hold any national position until the defendant is indicted and courts finds the defendant discharged of any wrong doing. 
If this amendment is not instituted any criminal could hold any office under s serious breach of trust by any minister. 
If anyone has s criminal case outstanding that person should be banned from seeking any office until all cases against that individual has been discharged from any such case of cases. 
If this is implemented there will be many corrupt and others with criminal cases will be automatically eliminated. 
This will open up many opportunities for honest people to seek national office. 
I am hoping that all the sewer rats are banished permanently.
I believe the president is fighting for the little man. I like to see more people follow his lead.
